H0.text: Atherosclerosis is the term for buildup of cell debris and cholesterol inside the arteries.

H1.text: Fibrosis is the term for buildup of cell debris and cholesterol inside arteries.

H2.text: Phimosis is the term for buildup of cell debris and cholesterol inside the arteries.

H3.text: Sclerosis is the term for buildup of cell debris and cholesterol inside the arteries.

A4.text: Atherosclerosis is a hardening of an artery specifically due to an atheromatous plaque.

A5.text: Arteriosclerosis is a general term describing any hardening (and loss of elasticity) of medium or large arteries
